item.title: streaming server
item.description: PINE A64を使って配信鯖(nginx-rtmp-moduleが乗ったnginx)を建てたい 資料 https://github.com/arut/nginx-rtmp-module https://docs.nginx.com/nginx/admin-guide/installing-nginx/installing-nginx-open-source/# https://www.nginx.com/resources/wiki/start/topics/examples/initscripts/# https://github.com/ytdl-org/youtube-dl
